CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I can help you identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. Here are the entities I found:

1. PC71BM - This is a material name, which is a type of polymer.
2. blend layers - This is a term that refers to a mixture of two or more materials, in this case, polymers.
3. PCE - This is an abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency," which is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell or photovoltaic device.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PC71BM
2. blend layers

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PC71BM

I removed "blend layers" as it does not refer directly to a material name. Let me know if you have any other questions!

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PV.content:

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

Therefore, the answer is:

Property Value: PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) = 9.70%
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Based on your clarification, the following are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - The maximum PCE of 9.70% is a value that refers to the efficiency of the photovoltaic material in converting sunlight into electrical energy.

Therefore, the answer is:

Property Value: PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) = 9.70%
